meta.description: Mock federal grant data for development and testing

grants.title: AI for Defense Applications
grants.description: Seeking innovative AI solutions for defense applications including autonomous systems, cybersecurity, and logistics optimization.

grants.title: Artificial Intelligence Research Institutes
grants.description: Multi-institutional AI research institutes focused on advancing AI for materials discovery, climate science, and healthcare.

grants.title: Explainable AI for Military Decision Making
grants.description: Developing AI systems that can explain their decision-making processes for military applications.
grants.eligibility: U.S. organizations with security clearance capability

grants.title: AI for Space Exploration
grants.description: AI technologies for autonomous spacecraft operations, planetary exploration, and space science data analysis.

grants.title: Artificial Intelligence Next Campaign
grants.description: Revolutionary AI research for national security applications including autonomous systems, cybersecurity, and logistics optimization.

grants.title: AI for Medical Diagnosis
grants.description: Developing AI systems for early disease detection and personalized treatment recommendations.
grants.eligibility: Small businesses partnering with research institutions

grants.title: Smart Grid AI Optimization
grants.description: AI-powered optimization of electrical grid systems for improved efficiency and renewable energy integration.
grants.eligibility: US companies with energy sector experience
